meaningMnemonic: When a <radical>drunkard</radical> holds a <radical>sword</radical> it <kanji>becomes</kanji> something else. The drunkard doesn't become a swordsman, they're still just a drunkard. But the sword in their hands does.
readingMnemonic: The sword has <kanji>become</kanji> a <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい)! It's just like the saber you have! Hey, wait.
